name: Design Challenges
shortDescription: For the Visual Communication and Information Design class we were given a challenge each week to create a design based on a set of rules. Each of those challenges and the final deliverables can be found below.  These designs were done in the most appropriate software based on the challenge; this usually was Sketch, Adobe InDesign, Adobe Photoshop or Adobe Illustrator.
